projects.name: Fabric API

projects.description: Fabric language module for Kotlin.

projects.name: Lithium
projects.description: Lithium is an free and open-source optimization mod for Minecraft which makes a wide range of performance improvements to the game.

projects.name: Phosphor
projects.description: Phosphor is an optimization mod for Minecraft which improves the performance of the lighting engine, resulting in significantly reduced world generation times and improved server tick rates.

projects.name: Sodium
projects.description: Sodium is an free and open-source optimization mod for Minecraft which improves frame rates and reduces lag spikes.

projects.name: LambDynamicLights
projects.description: Adds dynamic lights to the game.

projects.name: LambdaControls
projects.description: Adds better controls: controller and touchscreen support.

projects.name: LambdaBetterGrass
projects.description: Adds actual better grass.

projects.name: AuroraKeystrokes
projects.description: Displays the movement keys and mouse clicks on screen.

projects.name: MCPatcherPatcher
projects.description: Patches OptiFine and MCPatcher resource packs to alternatives format.

projects.name: Mod Menu
projects.description: Adds a mod menu to view the list of mods you have installed.

projects.name: Carpet
projects.description: Carpet Mod is a mod for vanilla Minecraft that allows you to take full control of what matters from a technical perspective of the game.

projects.name: Carpet Extra
projects.description: Additional, less vanilla additions to the carpet mod.

projects.name: Logical Zoom
projects.description: This is a simple Minecraft Fabic mod that adds a configurable zoom key.

projects.name: Tech Reborn
projects.description: Tech Reborn is a completely standalone tech mod including tools and machines to gather resources, process materials, and progress through the mod.

projects.name: Reborn Core
projects.description: Reborn Core is a library used for many of the Tech Reborn team's mods, including Tech Reborn, Quantum Storage, Fluxed Redstone, Hardcore Map Reset, and many more.

projects.name: Fabric Zero
projects.description: Compatibility and performance enhancement mod

projects.name: ModUpdater
projects.description: A simple Minecraft mod updater.

projects.name: Colormatic
projects.description: Adds the ability to customize colors hardcoded in vanilla.

projects.name: Soaring Clouds
projects.description: Allows you to configure the height of clouds in the world.

projects.name: Canvas Renderer
projects.description: Minecraft Renderer for Fabric supporting the FREX API

projects.name: Ok Zoomer
projects.description: The next generation of Ok Zoomer, currently in alpha stages! This mod adds a highly configurable zoom button. By default, it provides its own take on zooming, however, with the mod's config, you can drastically change the zoom with something more familiar or useful.

projects.name: AppleSkin
projects.description: Adds various food-related HUD improvements

projects.name: WorldEdit
projects.description: WorldEdit is an easy-to-use in-game world editor for Minecraft, supporting both single- and multi-player.

projects.name: Antique Atlas
projects.description: Antique Atlas is a book that acts like a map featuring infinite scrolling, zoom and custom labeled markers. The map is generated around the player by calculating the average biome in each 16x16 chunk.

projects.name: Harvest
projects.description: Configurable right click crop harvesting

projects.name: Soul Shards Respawn
projects.description: Powerful spawners for any mob!

projects.description: What am I looking at?

projects.name: CraftPresence
projects.description: Completely Customize the way others see you play in Discord!

projects.description: Modifies the background behind Minecraft GUIs to have a blur effect

projects.description: Modifies the background behind Minecraft GUIs to have a blur effect

projects.name: Giselbaers Durability Viewer
projects.description:
Shows various things about the game:
- the remaining/missing durability on your armor and tools
- the amount of arrows in your inventory when you're wielding a bow
- the number of empty inventory slots
- timeouts for status effects
